# python-clone-page
A script for downloading complete web pages with assets

- [python-clone-page](#python-clone-page)
  - [Installation](#installation)
  - [Usage](#usage)
  - [Example](#example)

## Installation
```sh
pip install clone-page
```


## Usage
```sh
clone-page https://www.example.com/
```
